descriptionHtml:
I was bored and decided to try my hand with textures.  I really don\'t know what I\'m doing but I like how this looks anyways so I figured I would share it.  I appreciate any and all constructive criticism.  I know there\'s some spots I messed up, some spots that have too much red, different shades of red, so on but I said already I\'m new to this =P.  If people end up liking the this I\'ll go ahead and redo it and take more time on it and probably do the scabbard as well.  Enjoy.

*Update*  Decided to do the scabbard now anyways just because it didn\'t look right without it.  

**Be warned...this will replace the default colors for any ebony weapon that uses a scabbard.**
author: Frozeninreality
